verses.verse: אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חִכְּךָ֣ <S%H2441><s%> to thy mouth שֹׁפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> [Set] the trumpet כַּנֶּ֖שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> [He shall come] as an eagle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> against the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because עָבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> because they have transgressed בְרִיתִ֔י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against תּוֹרָתִ֖י <S%H8451><s%> against my law פָּשָֽׁעוּ׃ <S%H6586><s%> and trespassed
לִ֖י יִזְעָ֑קוּ <S%H2199><s%> shall cry אֱלֹהַ֥י <S%H430><s%> unto me My God יְֽדַעֲנ֖וּךָ <S%H3045><s%> we know יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel
זָנַ֥ח <S%H2186><s%> hath cast off יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [the thing that is] good אוֹיֵ֖ב <S%H341><s%> the enemy יִרְדְּֽפוֹ׃ <S%H7291><s%> shall pursue

הֵ֤ם <S%H1992><s%> They הִמְלִיכוּ֙ <S%H4427><s%> They have set up kings וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not מִמֶּ֔נִּי <S%H4480><s%> They הֵשִׂ֖ירוּ <S%H8323><s%> have appointed וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not יָדָ֑עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> and I knew כַּסְפָּ֣ם <S%H3701><s%> [it] not of their silver וּזְהָבָ֗ם <S%H2091><s%> and their gold עָשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> have they made לָהֶם֙ עֲצַבִּ֔ים <S%H6091><s%> them idols לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of יִכָּרֵֽת׃ <S%H3772><s%> that they may be cut off

זָנַח֙ <S%H2186><s%> hath cast עֶגְלֵ֣ךְ <S%H5695><s%> Thy calf שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> O Samaria חָרָ֥ה <S%H2734><s%> is kindled אַפִּ֖י <S%H639><s%> [thee] off mine anger בָּ֑ם עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long מָתַ֕י <S%H4970><s%> How לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> against them how long [will it be] ere יוּכְל֖וּ <S%H3201><s%> they attain נִקָּיֹֽן׃ <S%H5356><s%> cleanness

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Surely מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> For from Israel וְה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> this חָרָ֣שׁ <S%H2796><s%> [was] it also the workman עָשָׂ֔הוּ <S%H6213><s%> made וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> it therefore it [is] not God ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> this כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely שְׁבָבִ֣ים <S%H7616><s%> shall be broken in pieces יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> become עֵ֖גֶל <S%H5695><s%> but the calf שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind יִזְרָ֖עוּ <S%H2232><s%> For they have sown וְסוּפָ֣תָה <S%H5492><s%> the whirlwind יִקְצֹ֑רוּ <S%H7114><s%> and they shall reap קָמָ֣ה <S%H7054><s%> it hath no stalk אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> has ל֗וֹ צֶ֚מַח <S%H6780><s%> the bud בְּלִ֣י <S%H1097><s%> no יַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> shall yield קֶּ֔מַח <S%H7058><s%> no meal אוּלַ֣י <S%H194><s%> if יַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> so be it yield זָרִ֖ים <S%H2114><s%> the strangers יִבְלָעֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H1104><s%> shall swallow it up

נִבְלַ֖ע <S%H1104><s%> is swallowed up יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> are now הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> now shall they be among the Gentiles כִּכְלִ֖י <S%H3627><s%> as a vessel אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> no חֵ֥פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> wherein [is] no pleasure בּֽוֹ׃

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> they עָל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> For they are gone up אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> to Assyria פֶּ֖רֶא <S%H6501><s%> a wild ass בּוֹדֵ֣ד <S%H909><s%> alone ל֑וֹ אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> by himself Ephraim הִתְנ֥וּ <S%H8566><s%> hath hired אֲהָבִֽים׃ <S%H158><s%> lovers

גַּ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> Even כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> though יִתְנ֥וּ <S%H8566><s%> Yea though they have hired בַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> among the nations עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אֲקַבְּצֵ֑ם <S%H6908><s%> now will I gather וַיָּחֵ֣לּוּ <S%H2490><s%> them and they shall sorrow מְּעָ֔ט <S%H4592><s%> a little מִמַּשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> for the burden מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king שָׂרִֽים׃ <S%H8269><s%> of princes

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Since הִרְבָּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> hath made many אֶפְרַ֛יִם <S%H669><s%> Because Ephraim מִזְבְּחֹ֖ת <S%H4196><s%> altars לַחֲטֹ֑א <S%H2398><s%> to sin הָיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> have become ל֥וֹ מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <S%H4196><s%> altars לַחֲטֹֽא׃ <S%H2398><s%> shall be unto him to sin

[אֶכתֹוב־ כ] (אֶ֨כְתָּב־ <S%H3789><s%> wrote ל֔וֹ <S%H3789><s%> I have written ק) [רִבֹּו כ] (רֻבֵּ֖י <S%H7239><s%> myriad ק) תּֽוֹרָתִ֑י <S%H8451><s%> of my law כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> as זָ֖ר <S%H2114><s%> as a strange thing נֶחְשָֽׁבוּ׃ <S%H2803><s%> [but] they were counted

זִבְחֵ֣י <S%H2077><s%> [for] the sacrifices הַבְהָבַ֗י <S%H1890><s%> of mine offerings יִזְבְּח֤וּ <S%H2076><s%> They sacrifice בָשָׂר֙ <S%H1320><s%> flesh וַיֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> and eat יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no רָצָ֑ם <S%H7521><s%> accepteth עַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יִזְכֹּ֤ר <S%H2142><s%> them not now will he remember עֲוֹנָם֙ <S%H5771><s%> their iniquity וְיִפְקֹ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> and visit חַטֹּאותָ֔ם <S%H2403><s%> their sins הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like מִצְרַ֥יִם <S%H4714><s%> to Egypt יָשֽׁוּבוּ׃ <S%H7725><s%> they shall return

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֨ח <S%H7911><s%> hath forgotten יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> For Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹשֵׂ֗הוּ <S%H6213><s%> his Maker וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <S%H1129><s%> and buildeth הֵֽיכָל֔וֹת <S%H1964><s%> temples וִֽיהוּדָ֕ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah הִרְבָּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> hath multiplied עָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> cities בְּצֻר֑וֹת <S%H1219><s%> fenced וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <S%H7971><s%> but I will send אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire בְּעָרָ֔יו <S%H5892><s%> upon his cities וְאָכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> and it shall devour אַרְמְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H759><s%> the palaces ס
